newsitem.title: MEXICO: Berol Corp ups stake in Mexican subsidiary.
newsitem.headline: Berol Corp ups stake in Mexican subsidiary.

text.p: Berol Corp will up its stake in pen makers Berol S.A. de C.V. to almost 100 percent, the company reported to the Mexican Stock Exchange on Friday.
U.S.-based Berol Corp is to buy 2,226,427 of 1 series shares in Berol S.A. de C.V , thereby raising its stake in the latter's share capital from 81.35 percent to 99.83 percent.
